name: Crystal Mines
description: Underground excavations for crystals provide valuable materials for crafting and magical purposes. The crystals can have magical properties, while the dangerous work and valuable materials create both opportunities and risks.
atmosphere: Crystal formations sparkle like frozen magic while magical energy hums through crystalline structures with otherworldly resonance. The air carries the scent of crystal dust, magical energy, and the promise of mystical properties. Every surface glitters with magical snow. Your skin tingles with magical energy and the sense of mystical danger. The taste of magical properties and crafting opportunity fills your mouth.
